    public class MasterOnlyAclController
extends MasterAllowed

    Controller that only allows the master role to perform actions.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Description copied from interface: IPrimitiveController
        Cleans up the controller. This is run when the cached controller instance is discarded.
        Specified by:
        cleanup in interface IPrimitiveController

      • initController

        public boolean initController()
        Description copied from interface: IPrimitiveController
        Initialise the controller. This method is run once at instantiation of the controller. If the return is false, the controller is discarded and the primitive control request fails. The controller instance will not be cached.
        Specified by:
        initController in interface IPrimitiveController
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • postRoute

        public boolean postRoute()
        Description copied from interface: IPrimitiveController
        Runs after the completion of an action method. If the return is false, the cached controlled is discarded.
        Specified by:
        postRoute in interface IPrimitiveController
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • preRoute

        public boolean preRoute()
        Description copied from interface: IPrimitiveController
        Runs before routing of a primitive control request to an action method. If the return is false, the primitive control request fails and the cached controller is discarded.
        Specified by:
        preRoute in interface IPrimitiveController
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
